creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Fragment made of two pieces of cloth sewn together leaving a slit. Stepped edges on two sides. Tapestry with areas of discontinuous complementary weft- patterning. Motif of interlocking triangles (birds) in red, green, yellow, and blue. Piece of brown cloth sewn to reverse.
title: Neckline of Garment with Birds
